item.description:
*GOLF 101 *Develop Your Skills For A Lifetime Of Great Golf – $17/hour
GOLF 101 Lessons for New Golfers – Learn to Golf & Improve Your Game

GOLF 102 - Scramble Tournament Playing Lesson
ADVANCED GOLF with LEGENDARY GOLF CHAMPION MIKE COLANDRO
Have you always wanted to play Golf? Do you want to improve your Golfing Skills and play better?

Learn to Golf and Improve Your Skills Without Breaking The Bank with Golf 101 and Golf 102 Lessons - 6 Hours of Hands On Lessons for Only $100 (includes Golf Balls, Golf Clubs and ALL FEES)
- That is less than $17/hour for quality Golf Lessons from a Certified Teaching Professional!

– 6 Hours of hands on group lessons for only $100 (less than $17 per hour) with a Certified Teaching Golf Professional - small class size of 9 people gives you personal attention

Includes clubs and all course fees * Choose any 3 classes to fit your schedule

Classes include * Putting * Chipping * Driving Range * Video Golf Swing Analysis

In 2009, more than 100 New Golfers graduated from Golf 101 lessons * 2010 Classes are filling up quickly!

* We will notify you of any postponements and to reschedule your makeup class *

CLASSES AVAILABLE ON:

MONDAYS * 6-8pm

THURSDAYS * 6-8pm

SUNDAYS * 4:30 – 6:30 pm

Classes are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course
85 Miner Hills Drive
Middletown, CT 06457

Exit 20 off I-91 Country Club Road

10 minutes from Hartford * 10 minutes from New Haven

Read about Golf 101 in the Hartford Courant:
Visit http://www.courant.co...

GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 lessons are only $100 Online Advance Registration Discount
or $150 at the lessons (cash only) – call for availability
* SAVE $50 – buy your ticket online *

Reserve your spot today – visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449

· Get a FREE certificate for 9 holes of Golf at Miner Hills Golf Course with your GOLF 101 enrollment! Supplies are limited – so sign up today and get your FREE round of Golf *


ADVANCED GOLF with LEGENDARY GOLF CHAMPION MIKE COLANDRO

FOR EXPERIENCED GOLFERS ONLY

ADVANCED GOLF with Legendary Golf Champion gives you a once in a lifetime opportunity to play Golf with and learn from Golf Champion Mike Colandro- and benefit from his years of experience to help you improve your Golfing knowledge and skills.

ADVANCED Golf starts out Tuesday at the Driving Range with Short Irons for an unique Golf Lesson that with help you to play better Golf.

The next lesson is Thursday at the Driving Range with Fairway Woods

The third lesson is Tuesday covering Putting and Chipping to make you a great Golfer.

Thursday is used as a rain date in case of any bad weather in the first 3 lesson dates.

SUNDAY gives you personalized Playing Lessons out on this beautiful 9 hole Golf Course located in Windsor CT Connecticut

LESSONS ARE HELD at:

The Tradition Golf Club At Windsor
147 Pigeon Hill Rd
Windsor, CT 06095

TUES 6:30 -7:30 pm
Driving Range -Short Irons

THURS 6:30 -7:30 pm Driving Range
Fairway Woods and Drivers

TUES 6:30 -7:30 pm
Putting and Chipping

THURS 6:30 -7:30pm
RAIN DATE

SUNDAY 4-7 pm
9 holes Playing Lesson
7 pm - AFTERPARTY with Mike Colandro and PRIZES from Titleist

Join Mike Colandro after the Playing Lessons for more Golf Tips, Golf Stories, PRIZES from Titleist, and a great time!

NOTE- Class Size Is Limited To 6 People And Will Fill Up Quickly -Reserve Your Spot Today

-Play Golf with Mike Colandro while he teaches you the skills that he used to win Championships in Australia and New Zealand. ADVANCED GOLF with Mike Colandro is a very unique opportunity to learn from and play Golf with a Golf Legend!

Your 6 hours of Golf Lessons include Driving Range -Short Irons, Fairway Woods and Drivers, Putting and Chipping, and 9 holes of Playing Lessons out on the Golf Course. Class size is 6 people - that guarantees you personal attention.

Join Mike after the Playing Lessons for an after party to ask questions and talk Golf - Plus PRIZES from Titleist


ADVANCED GOLF - $200 for 6 Hours of hands-on Golf Lessons

Class Size is limited to 6 people to ensure personal attention

GIVE DAD THE GIFT HE WILL REMEMBER FOREVER – A ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERSONAL GOLF LESSON WITH GOLF CHAMPION MIKE COLANDRO!

Visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449 for info


----------------------------------------------
See You On The Course!

WHAT OUR STUDENTS ARE SAYING:

“ Golf 101 was a fun and inexpensive way to learn Golf from the beginning. Having never golfed before, I was nervous, but our Instructor George did a great job teaching our group, and I am having a great time in Golf 102!”
Rodney P, New Haven CT

“ Inexpensive, high quality Lessons in a small group, I made new golfing buddies and am enjoying the game of golf”
June B, Bloomfield CT

“ I have taken lessons from golf pros before, but Golf 102 Playing Lessons were more effective and less expensive than any other lessons.”
Jim S, Newington CT

“ I was not sure if I would enjoy Golfing so I tried Golf 101 and I love it! The Instructor was very patient and answered all my questions, and made the lessons fun!”
Gloria W, Milford, CT

Reserve your spot today – visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our Golf Instructor by the clubhouse wearing the white www.CTGolfTips.com hat
